name: Darken Pages
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Decrease brightness for all pages.
additional_info:
Implementation is based on feColorMatrix filter with Martix: 
 / R' \     / 0.45 0    0    0    0 \     / R \
|  G'  |   |  0    0.40 0    0    0  |   |  G  |
|  B'  | = |  0    0    0.33 0    0  | * |  B  |
|  A'  |   |  0    0    0    1    0  |   |  A  |
 \ 1  /     \ 0    0    0    0    1 /     \ 1 /
